column1: Talk with your doctor before you take any medicines, herbs, or other supplements.
Do not take aspirin, ibuprofen (Motrin, Advil), naproxen (Aleve), or other medicines unless your doctor tells you it is OK.
- Talk with your doctor about using stool softeners or laxatives if you are straining when you have bowel movements.
- Place ice wrapped in a washcloth on your nose to help slow the bleeding.
